name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Productivize : Supercharge your new tab page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab page to focus on what matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of tasks and information right in your browser! 

Don't settle for a basic new tab page - upgrade to our feature-packed extension today and start achieving more than ever before. Download now and experience the power of productivity!

Features :

1. Dark mode for comfortable and efficient work
2. Track time passed for day, week, month, year
3. Planner feature to keep you organized and productive
4. Motivational quotes to stay inspired
5. Most visited sites and bookmarks in one glance.
6. Customizations for tasks.
7. Clock that updates every second to keep you on schedule.
8. Save unlimited notes, tabs while categorizing into sections.
9. Save all your data in cloud with a FREE account!

With Dark mode, you can work comfortably and efficiently at any time of the day. Stay on top of your schedule with the ability to track the percentage of time passed for the day, week, month, and year. And with our planner feature, you can easily add tasks for each of these time periods, keeping you organized and productive.

But that's not all! Our extension includes motivational quotes to keep you inspired and on-task. And with our clock that updates every second, you'll never miss a deadline or appointment again.
